description: Smallest prime with primitive root of n or 0 if no such prime exists.
comments: a(n) = 0 only for perfect squares, A000290.
crossrefs: Here the primitive root may be larger than the prime, whereas in A023049 in may not be.
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 07 2000
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Jud McCranie_, Mar 21, 2002.
